This is truly an amazing hentai by the legend himself Urakan who's done many classics actually. The art style is simple and gets the job done and it's a Urakan staple, though the disappointing thing is that it isn't in color which most of Urakan-sans works are so I'll be rating it a 7/10.

The psychological element in this is the best I've seen in many recent works since the mother is a slut who likes the fuck her family and the boy (her own child) likes to watch and eventually in the future will fuck her, I like how he thinks in his innocent head this is normal. The best part though I'd say is that to keep it original which is the style of our Urakan-san he didn't make the boy fuck her, all in all, 10/10.

The story is nothing to write home about it serves as a filler and gets the job done and it's very simple, the only best thing which allows you to nut here is the psychological aspect. All in all a 9/10.
